channel.title: Pimpscape server source jaw is missing
channel.description:
after compiling, i found that the jaw was missing!! :eek: Dang its freaky!!! Does anybody know how to solve this that have solved it before????
Look you can see right through the jaw!! [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/8243/jawmissing1yb5.png[/img] [img]http://img57.imageshack.us/img57/8831/jawmissing2hz8.png[/img] [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/6494/jawmissing3do5.png[/img] [img]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/4606/jawmissing4yk7.png[/img]

item.title: Pimpscape server source jaw is missing
item.dc:creator: @kungfoobunny kungfoobunny
item.description:
@kungfoobunny wrote:

Fixed it!!!
Great instructions except you said delete everything after } else {, when actualy, you needed to keep this:
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
}
and then add
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard Fix By I Metal I
else
TY Sick of air for your services!!
And The Moose, I don’t know where in hell you got that I added else before If…
I was using my Compiler, not typing in code, anybody could of figured that out, by READING IT.

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape server source jaw is missing
item.dc:creator: @kungfoobunny kungfoobunny
item.description:
@kungfoobunny wrote:

When I do what you tell me too it says this.

Player.java:770: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

The reason why I think it is, is because in the code that you gave me, there are 2 ‘else’ but only 1 ‘if’. If it is my compiler, then tell me what compiler i should use…

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape server source jaw is missing
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

slump40:

Some sources come like that there is no way to fix that unless you do some major coding or get a new source (Not sure about the major coding part lol)

-.- Yes there is a way to fix…

Step 1: open up your player java and search for

			[code]playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]);[/code]

you should see
if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { Step 2: scroll down slowly and look for

		// array of 5 bytes defining the colors

Step 3: If there is anything between that and

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { replace it with

[code] if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard Fix By I Metal I
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}[/code]if there is nothing between them just put it under

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else {

Read full topic
